name: Star Escape (FoXDeN)
description:
You are the creator of life. Modify the planet itself to create humans. But beware, the sun is expanding and about to devoure your planet. Escape as soon as possible!

Important
Java JDK 11 or higher is required to play. Don't run the game with the Java JRE.

Tipps
Click on the Planet to Show Infos
Collect Asteroids to gather Matter and Minerals

Credits
Programming and Game Logic:  FoX
Graphics and Art: Hexa

SPOILER

Temperature: ~25°C
Fertility: 100%
Pressure: ~1,5 Bar

Distance to Sun changes Temperature.
Mass changes Pressure.
Atmosphere changes Pressure and Temperature.
Magnetic Field changes Protection.
If every condition is fullfilled, Fertility must be as high as possible
